subject: Officiating (Sports)
Deaths (Obituaries)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mr. Garretson developed the concept of “refereeing the defense” and had a career that included more than 2,000 N.B.A. games and spanned 31 years.
snippet: Mr. Garretson developed the concept of “refereeing the defense” and had a career that included more than 2,000 N.B.A. games and spanned 31 years.
